attributes.action: Stop the closure of Cafe and Park Britannia in Norwich
attributes.additional_details: This is such a unique project and there are absolutely no grounds for these cafes to close and for the 50 or so people who work there to lose there jobs! These cafes are much loved and are always busy with both locals and visitors to Norwich. The project started 5 years ago and has gone from strength to strength!
attributes.background: The Ministry of Justice have asked both Cafe and Park Britannia in Norwich to cease trading. Both of these cafes are instrumental in introducing prisoners who are serving time back to the world of work and integrating them back into society.
